about_me_text: I am a software developer specialized in back-end and full-stack development, with experience creating and maintaining custom systems that optimize performance and scalability. I have worked across the entire project lifecycle, from planning to production, managing APIs, databases, and servers in both local and cloud environments. I have experience with Google Cloud Platform, Docker, Bitbucket Pipelines, and frameworks such as CodeIgniter, Flask, and Laravel. I have also technically led teams, promoting best practices and organization to meet business objectives. My strengths include solving complex problems, working collaboratively, and quickly adapting to new technologies.

skills.label: Database Management & Optimization
skills.description: Advanced experience with schema design (SQL/NoSQL) and query optimization for high performance. Knowledge in handling databases for production and distributed environments.

skills.label: Database API Development & Integration
skills.description: Development and management of robust and secure APIs. Experience in integrating third-party services and managing request traffic.

skills.label: Cloud & Containerization
skills.description: Experience with Google Cloud Platform services and Docker for deploying and managing applications in scalable environments.

skills.label: DevOps & Deployment Pipelines
skills.description: Experience configuring and maintaining CI/CD pipelines and using Docker to ensure consistency and efficient deployment in development and production environments.
